roleset.name: make-believe
roleset.note: PRETEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pretend' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from pretend.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: premise as full S
example.text: It's just comic when they-1 try *trace*-1 to pretend they're still the master race.''

example.name: premise as infinitive
example.text: A Flemish game show has as its host a Belgian pretending to be Italian.
